wham.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: used to describe the sound of something suddenly hitting something else very hard
wham.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Wham! The car hit the wall.
wham.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: used to express the idea that something very unexpected suddenly happens
wham.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Life is going along nicely and then, wham, you lose your job.
